subject: Olympic Games (2012)
Horsemanship and Equestrian Events
Horses
lead_paragraph: Rafalca, a 15-year-old mare, will make her Olympic debut next week in dressage, a sport sometimes referred to as horse ballet. She is co-owned by Mitt Romney’s wife, Ann.
snippet: Rafalca, a 15-year-old mare, will make her Olympic debut next week in dressage, a sport sometimes referred to as horse ballet. She is co-owned by Mitt Romney’s wife, Ann.
